name: POFW Option Images
author: Pektsekye

sections.description:
This plugin requires Simple Product Options for WooCommerce plugin.

It allows to upload an image for each option value.
And displays the images for the selected options on the front-end product page.

You can check a demo page here:
DEMO Page

You can read the installation instructions here:
README

Simple Code Idea:

The idea of this plugin is to keep the base version as simple as possible.
And to add the new features as modifications.

This plugin has just 18 files to make it easy to use and customize. If you need more features check the modifications page hottons.com/oi_modifications

Contact me by email pektsekye@gmail.com if you have questions or need help.

Translators

Available Languages

  • English (Default)

Documentation

Full documentation is available here.
sections.installation:
Requires WordPress 4.7, WooCommerce 3.0 and Simple Product Options for WooCommerce 1.0

  1. Unzip the downloaded zip file.
  2. Upload the plugin folder into the wp-content/plugins/ directory of your WordPress site.
  3. Activate POFW Option Images from Plugins page.

Contact me by email pektsekye@gmail.com if you have questions or need help.
